sn10.10:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn10.10:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena annataro upasako sukkaya bhikkhuniya bhojanam adasi.
sn10.10:1.3: Atha kho sukkaya bhikkhuniya abhippasanno yakkho rajagahe rathikaya rathikam singhatakena singhatakam upasankamitva tayam velayam imam gatham abhasi:
